name: Command & Conquer: Tiberian Sun - Firestorm
description:
Command & Conquer: Tiberian Sun - Firestorm is a strategy game developed by Westwood Studios. It came out on 01-01-2000. Electronic Arts published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Command & Conquer: Tiberian Sun - Firestorm is available on PC.
It was produced by Brett W. Sperry, Donny Miel and Rade Stojsavljevic. It was scored by Frank Klepacki and Jarrid Mendelson.
